items.sentence: Tom told me he didn\'t actually want to do that.
Tom told me he knows who Mary\'s grandfather is.
Tom told me he\'s not interested in you anymore.
I lost my temper and kicked the vending machine.
Tom applied for a passport, but was turned down.
What kinds of things do you like to do with Tom?
What made you believe Tom was telling the truth?
The firefighters rescued them from the elevator.
Tom thought he\'d found the right woman for him.
Tom promised me he wouldn\'t ever do that again.
